/**
 @page AES_ECB

 @verbatim
 * @file    AES/ECB/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2014-12-24
 * @brief   Description of AES_ECB example.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example shows how to use AES-ECB  to encrypt/decrypt data.

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- Connect a null-modem female/female RS232 cable between the COM1 DB9 connector and PC serial port.
  Hyperterminal configuration:
  - Word Length = 8 Bits
  - One Stop Bit
  - No parity
  - BaudRate = 115200 baud
  - flow control: None
